original_text: From the first day of the seventh month they began to offer burnt offerings to the Lord. But the foundation of the temple of the Lord was not yet laid.
korean_text: 일곱째 달 초하루부터 비로소 여호와께 번제를 드렸으나 그 때에 여호와의 성전 지대는 미처 놓지 못한지라

sentences.original_text: From the first day of the seventh month
they began to offer burnt offerings to the Lord
But the foundation of the temple of the Lord
